name: BrambleLash
description: BrambleLash is a spritely local multiplayer co-opetition with team swapping action. Enchanted sprites tether together to defeat slimey hordes, whilst plotting the demise of their teammates to get ahead. Connect, co-operate or betray to win!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: 2.3 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9800 GTX / Radeon HD 4830 / Intel HD 520 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
